languages.text: "Глупое дитя, твой мирок ограничен тьмой нижних палуб и словами Висиря. Ты ничего не знаешь об истине и смерти, ты даже о себе самой ничего не знаешь". {n}Голос сочится ядовитой снисходительностью.{/n}

"Foolish child. Your world is limited to the darkness of the lower decks and the words of your Vizsier. You know nothing of truth or death. You do not even know the first thing about yourself." {n}"Theodora's" voice is dripping with venomous condescension.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Глупое дитя, твой мирок ограничен тьмой нижних палуб и словами Висиря. Ты ничего не знаешь об истине и смерти, ты даже о себе самой ничего не знаешь". {n}Голос сочится ядовитой снисходительностью.{/n}

"Foolish child. Your world is limited to the darkness of the lower decks and the words of your Vizsier. You know nothing of truth or death. You do not even know the first thing about yourself." {n}"Theodora's" voice is dripping with venomous condescension.{/n}

languages.text: «Niña insensata. Tu mundo está limitado a la oscuridad de las cubiertas inferiores y a las palabras de tu Visir. ¿Qué sabrás tú de verdad o de muerte? Ni siquiera te comprendes a ti misma». {n}La voz de «Theodora» rezuma la ponzoña de la condescendencia.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Foolish child. Your world is limited to the darkness of the lower decks and the words of your Vizsier. You know nothing of truth or death. You do not even know the first thing about yourself." {n}"Theodora's" voice is dripping with venomous condescension.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Niña insensata. Tu mundo está limitado a la oscuridad de las cubiertas inferiores y a las palabras de tu Visir. ¿Qué sabrás tú de verdad o de muerte? Ni siquiera te comprendes a ti misma». {n}La voz de «Theodora» rezuma la ponzoña de la condescendencia.{/n}

languages.text: 「愚かな子供よ。おまえの世界は下層デッキの暗闇とヴィジールの言葉だけだ。あなたは真実も死も知らない。自分自身のことすら知らない」{n}シオドーラの声は毒々しい恩着せがましさで溢れていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Foolish child. Your world is limited to the darkness of the lower decks and the words of your Vizsier. You know nothing of truth or death. You do not even know the first thing about yourself." {n}"Theodora's" voice is dripping with venomous condescension.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「愚かな子供よ。おまえの世界は下層デッキの暗闇とヴィジールの言葉だけだ。あなたは真実も死も知らない。自分自身のことすら知らない」{n}シオドーラの声は毒々しい恩着せがましさで溢れていた。{/n}

languages.text: “愚蠢的孩子啊，你的世界仅仅局限于底层甲板的黑暗，以及宿老的话语。你对真理与死亡一无所知，你甚至对你自己都没有丝毫了解。”{n}“西奥多拉”的声音中充满了恶毒的傲慢。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Foolish child. Your world is limited to the darkness of the lower decks and the words of your Vizsier. You know nothing of truth or death. You do not even know the first thing about yourself." {n}"Theodora's" voice is dripping with venomous condescension.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “愚蠢的孩子啊，你的世界仅仅局限于底层甲板的黑暗，以及宿老的话语。你对真理与死亡一无所知，你甚至对你自己都没有丝毫了解。”{n}“西奥多拉”的声音中充满了恶毒的傲慢。{/n}

languages.text: "Dummes Kind. Eure Welt ist beschränkt auf die Dunkelheit der unteren Decks und die Worte Eures Wesirs. Ihr wisst nichts über die Wahrheit oder den Tod. Ihr wisst nicht einmal das Wichtigste über Euch selbst." {n}"Theodoras" Stimme trieft vor giftiger Verachtung.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Foolish child. Your world is limited to the darkness of the lower decks and the words of your Vizsier. You know nothing of truth or death. You do not even know the first thing about yourself." {n}"Theodora's" voice is dripping with venomous condescension.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Dummes Kind. Eure Welt ist beschränkt auf die Dunkelheit der unteren Decks und die Worte Eures Wesirs. Ihr wisst nichts über die Wahrheit oder den Tod. Ihr wisst nicht einmal das Wichtigste über Euch selbst." {n}"Theodoras" Stimme trieft vor giftiger Verachtung.{/n}

languages.text: « Petite sotte. Votre monde se limite à l'obscurité des ponts inférieurs et aux propos de votre vizir. Vous ignorez tout de la vérité et de la mort. Vous ne vous connaissez même pas vous-même. » {n}La voix de « Théodora » dégouline de condescendance venimeuse.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Foolish child. Your world is limited to the darkness of the lower decks and the words of your Vizsier. You know nothing of truth or death. You do not even know the first thing about yourself." {n}"Theodora's" voice is dripping with venomous condescension.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Petite sotte. Votre monde se limite à l'obscurité des ponts inférieurs et aux propos de votre vizir. Vous ignorez tout de la vérité et de la mort. Vous ne vous connaissez même pas vous-même. » {n}La voix de « Théodora » dégouline de condescendance venimeuse.{/n}

languages.text: "Aptal çocuk. Senin dünyan, alt güvertelerin karanlığı ve Vezir'inin sözleriyle sınırlı. Ne hakikati ne de ölümü bilirsin. Kendine dair en ufak bir fikrin bile yok." {n}Theodora'nın sesinden zehirli bir horgörü akıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Foolish child. Your world is limited to the darkness of the lower decks and the words of your Vizsier. You know nothing of truth or death. You do not even know the first thing about yourself." {n}"Theodora's" voice is dripping with venomous condescension.{/n}
